text: Victor Edward Doddsworth (2 October 1911 – 1986) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1986 deaths Category:People from Mexborough Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Vic Doddsworth
